page.title: 04Yew Tree 2000 years old
page.content: In Church Town there is an old yew tree.It is thought to be 2000 years old.It grows in the church yard.Around it is an iron fence to protect it.On the fence are dates of wars and other things that the tree has grown through.The tree is quite tall.The church is Norman and has a tower with a flag-staff on it.You can see how the rain has worn away the bumpy bits on the wall so it is quite smooth.In the porch are some stone slabs with carvings on them.Outside are lots of lots of graves,some dating back to the 17th century.By the church are two stone coffins with a little raised bit of stone for the head to rest on.
